column5: Well I was in toys-r-us today when I came across this must have toy...  The packaging said 3 years and up...  Connor is only 7.5 months...   Close enough...lol  I figure I can help him hold and crank this toy... So he's ready for the real thing ASAP...  Sorry  Forgot the pic

Thats awesome. My daughter just turned two. This summer she was always pretending to fish with me from my parents dock and now she is reeling in and can cast about 5 feet lol. I am sure in no time your little guy will be catching musky bigger then him.
too funny Mike. Maybe he'll cuddle with it like a stuffed animal.
LOL...good stuff Mike...all those age recomendations are for other peoples kids in my experience.
Too funny, He will be out fishin ya in no time
Before you know it, he'll be bugging you to take him out fishing. Enjoy this time with him, he only grows up once.
